intro: Psychotria abouabouensis, commonly known as the Abouabou Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the rainforests of western Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It is often found in shaded, humid environments within the undergrowth of tropical forests. Psychotria abouabouensis is notable for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
